segments.text: Can you tell me about a nice restaurant to go to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ! How much would you like to spend on your meal ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My date is quite sophisticated . She would expect nothing less than the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how about our own hotel restaurant ? It's conveniently located and has a three-star rating .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea , except I want to go out , not stay in . Something else , maybe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how about Gramercy Tavern ? It's a very popular tourist spot , with great food and music .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good ! Could you call them to see if I can get a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , sir . You've made a good choice .
segments.speaker: S2
